digilib.servlet

Class DocumentBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • digilib.servlet.DocumentBean
  • Deprecated. 
    use DigilibBean instead.

    public class DocumentBean
extends Object
    Java bean providing access to digilib configuration and functionality for JSPs.
    Author:
    robcast
